p: Data are presented as percentages for categorical variables or as averages±standard deviation (SD) for continuous variables. To compare frequencies of categorical variables, either χ 2 test or Fisher Exact test were used. If adjustment for covariates was required, binary logistic regression models were used. To compare continuous variables, T-test or analysis of variance (ANOVA) were used, and when adjustment for covariates was required, we used linear regression models.
